entities.name: nick
entities.description: Nick is the Nearly Headless Nick, a ghost who lives in Hogwarts. He is described as being surprised and a little offended when asked about the Gray Lady.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one asking for help from Nick, he feels that his hands have been thrust into icy water when Nick grasps them.

entities.name: gray lady
entities.description: The Gray Lady is a ghost who lives in Ravenclaw Tower. She is the one that Nick mentions as being the ghost of Ravenclaw Tower, and Harry is looking for her.

relationships.description: Nick helps Harry by trying to find the Gray Lady for him. This is described in the text where Nick says 'if it is ghostly services you require —?'
Nick has knowledge about the Gray Lady, he knows that she is the ghost of Ravenclaw Tower and mentions her as such when Harry asks him.
Harry is asking Nick for help in finding the Gray Lady, this is described in the text where Harry says 'Who’s the ghost of Ravenclaw Tower?' and then asks Nick if he knows where she is.
